sattupalabbhati.example_1: you won’t find a sentient being here.

bhāsiṃ.example_1: Thinking it would be troublesome, Divinity, <j>I did not teach

gharaṃ.sutta_1: ‘ahaṃ kūṭāgārassa heṭṭhimaṃ gharaṃ akaritvā uparimaṃ gharaṃ āropessāmī’ti—
gharaṃ.example_1: ‘Before the lower story of a bungalow is built, I will hoist up the upper story.’

sukhamāyatikaṃ.example_1: Now that you’ve seen the sage who has crossed over, <j>madam,
